EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Webinar_UK_The Cloud Native Journey Q116.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Journey Webinar on Tuesday, February 16, 2016. Please see event details below.
Date: February 16, 2016 Time: 10AM GMT Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1112697/FB0B9EC23F6D2E92ACF293C6966A5131]]> {{my.Save the Date - UK CNJ}}
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
We Look Forward to you Joining us! The Pivotal Team
